title: Static Analysis

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity', 'location'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "modify_hotspots_summ" : "Verwijder hotspots uit de lijst van vertrouwde en geblokkeerde hotspots (geavanceerd)"
"clear_hotspots_summ" : "Klik hier om alle vertrouwde en onvertrouwde hotspots te vergeten"
"pref_onlyknown_summ" : "Apenas permitir conexões para aceder a pontos de acesso, quando estes tiverem disponíveis (por pedir-lhe a primeira vez que você se lige a um novo ponto de acesso)"
"clear_hotspots_summ" : "Hiermit wird die Liste aller vertrauenswürdigen und nicht vertrauenswürdigen Hotspots gelöscht."
"modify_hotspots_summ" : "Remove hotspots from your list of trusted and blocked hotspots (advanced)"
"dialog_removetrustedmac" : "Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir retirer le point d'accès "%1$s" de cette liste ?"

"pref_tracking_summ" : "Activando esta opção irá ajudar ainda mais na investigação desta aplicação, enviando dados anónimos, como por exemplo se ainda está a usar esta aplicação. Não recolhemos qualquer tipo de informação pessoal assim bem como o nome das redes."
"pref_locationnotice_summ" : "Herinner me via een notificatie wanneer locatietoegang is uitgeschakeld"

"pref_onlyknown_summ" : "Laat enkel verbindingen toe wanneer we zeker zijn dat het netwerk beschikbaar is (er wordt voor elk netwerk één keer gevraagd of het beschikbaar zou moeten zijn op de huidige locatie)"
"pref_onlyavailable_summ" : "Prevent other people from viewing your list of networks by only enabling them when they are in range"
"location_permission_explanation" : "Wi-Fi PrivacyPolice heeft (beperkte) locatietoegang nodig om correct te functioneren. Klik hier voor meer informatie."
"pref_onlyknown_summ" : "Verbinden Sie sich nur mit WLAN-Zugangspunkten, wenn diese verfügbar sein sollten (Sie werden dazu beim ersten Mal vor dem Verbinden gefragt)."
"ask_permission" : "Tem a certeza que a rede %1$s deve estar disponível agora?"

"pref_tracking_summ" : "Enabling this helps further research by periodically sending anonymous usage data, such as whether you are still using the app. We do not collect any personally identifiable information, such as network names."
"info_string" : "Wi-Fi Privacy Police schützt Sie im Hintergrund. Sie können diese Anwendung schließen und müssen sich nicht weiter um diese Aspekte des Schutzes Ihrer Privatsphäre sorgen."
"dialog_removetrustedmac" : "Ben je zeker dat je hotspot "%1$s" wilt verwijderen?"

"dialog_clearhotspots" : "Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie die Liste aller vertrauenswürdigen und nicht vertrauenswürdigen Hotspots entfernen möchten? Dies wird dazu führen, dass Privacy Police bei jedem Hotspot nachfrägt, ob er verfügbar sein sollte."
"dialog_clearhotspots" : "Are you sure you want to remove all trusted and untrusted hotspots? This will result in Privacy Police asking you for every hotspot whether it should be allowed"
"dialog_removetrustedmac" : "Are you sure you want to remove access point "%1$s"?"
"location_permission_explanation" : "Wi-Fi PrivacyPolice might need (limited) location access in order to function correctly. Click here for more info."
"pref_onlyavailable_summ" : "Voorkom dat andere mensen je netwerklijst kunnen zien door netwerken enkel te activeren wanneer ze beschikbaar zijn"
"pref_onlyknown_summ" : "Only allow connections to hotspots when they should be available (by asking you the first time you connect to a new hotspot)"
"dialog_clearhotspotsformac" : "Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir retirer tous les points d'accès du réseau "%1$s" ?"
"pref_onlyknown_summ" : "Autoriser que les connexions aux points d'accès de confiance (une confirmation vous sera demandée lors de la première connexion)"
"pref_tracking_summ" : "Die Aktivierung dieser Funktion hilft bei der Weiterentwicklung dieser App. Wir sammeln keine personenbezogenen Daten, wie z.B. Netzwerknamen."
"dialog_clearhotspotsformac" : "Ben je zeker dat je alle hotspots voor het netwerk "%1$s" wilt verwijderen?"
"pref_locationnotice_summ" : "Remind me via a notification when coarse location access is disabled"
"dialog_clearhotspots" : "Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir retirer la liste de points d'accès ? Wi-Fi Privacy Police vous redemandera confirmation à chaque première connexion au point d'accès"

"location_permission_full_explanation" : "Sinds Android versie 6.0 (Marshmallow) kunnen applicaties enkel de beschikbare Wi-Fi netwerken zijn wanneer locatietoegang is ingeschakeld. Dit verschilt van apparaat tot apparaat, maar indien je problemen ondervindt bij het gebruik van Wi-Fi Privacypolice, overweeg dan om locatietoegang in te schakelen. Beperkte toegang (waarbij enkel Wi-Fi netwerken en zendmasten, en niet de GPS chip gebruikt worden) zou voldoende moeten zijn."

"pref_tracking_summ" : "Activer cette option aide au développement en envoyant périodiquement des données anonymes, comme par exemple si vous vous servez encore de l'application. Nous ne collectons pas d'informations personnelles telles que les noms des réseaux."

"info_string" : "Polícia de Privacidade Wi-Fi irá continuar a protegê-lo em segundo plano. Você pode fechar esta janela e parar de se preocupar com o envio de informações sensíveis emitidas pelo seu dispositivo."
"pref_onlyavailable_summ" : "Impedir que outras pessoas vejam sua lista de redes por apenas permitindo-los quando as redes estão na proximidade"

"dialog_clearhotspots" : "Ben je zeker dat je alle vertrouwde en onvertrouwde hotspots wil vergeten? Dit zal ervoor zorgen dat Privacy Police je voor elke hotspot opnieuw zal vragen of je ermee wil verbinden"
"pref_onlyavailable_summ" : "Schützen Sie sich davor, dass Fremde die Liste genutzter WLAN-Netwerke sehen, indem Sie einzelne Netzwerke nur aktivieren, wenn sie in Reichweite sind."
"info_string" : "Wi-Fi Privacy Police will keep protecting you in the background. You can close this window and stop worrying about privacy sensitive information leaking from your device."
"ask_permission" : "Ben je zeker dat "%1$s" hier aanwezig is?"

"pref_tracking_summ" : "Laat toe om periodiek anonieme gebruikersstatistieken, zoals frequentie van het gebruik van de applicatie, toe om verder onderzoek te helpen. We verzamelen geen persoonlijke informatie, zoals netwerknamen."
"dialog_clearhotspotsformac" : "Are you sure you want to remove all hotspots for the network "%1$s"?"

"location_permission_full_explanation" : "Starting with Android version 6.0 (Marshmallow), apps can only view the list of Wi-Fi networks that are in range while location access is enabled. Your mileage may vary (depending on the device you're using, this might not be the case), but if you experience problems when using Wi-Fi PrivacyPolice, consider enabling location access. Coarse location access (only using Wi-Fi networks and cell towers, and not your actual GPS chip) should be sufficient."
"modify_hotspots_summ" : "Retirer les points d'accès de la liste de confiance ou de celle des points d'accès bloqués (avancé)"
"pref_onlyavailable_summ" : "Empêcher que d'autres personnes puissent accéder à votre liste des points d'accès connus"
"clear_hotspots_summ" : "Click here to remove all trusted and untrusted hotspots from your list"
"dialog_removetrustedmac" : "Are you sure you want to remove hotspot "%1$s"?"
"info_string" : "Wi-Fi Privacy Police zal je automatisch beschermen. Je kan dit venster gewoon sluiten."
"info_string" : "Wi-Fi Privacy Police continue de vous protéger en arrière-plan. Vous pouvez fermer cette fenêtre."
"clear_hotspots_summ" : "Appuyez ici pour retirer votre liste de points d'accès"

"dialog_clearhotspots" : "Tem certeza de que deseja remover todos os hotspots autorizados e não autorizados? Isto resultará em Polícia de Privacidade pedindo-lhe para que cada hotspot deve ser autorizado"
"ask_permission" : "Are you sure network %1$s should be available right now?"
"clear_hotspots_summ" : "Clique aqui para remover todos os hotspots autorizados e não autorizados da sua lista"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

info.title: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
info.description:
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#logs

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.

hotspot.title: Found 1 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION (dangerous): coarse (network-based) location - Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.
